name: Okapi Design System (by UXstudio)
description:
Okapi is a UI kit with basic web components that are needed in every UX design project. 

The file includes:

  • Color styles
  • Text styles
  • Grid system
  • Iconography
  • Buttons
  • Input fields
  • Selection controls
  • Cards
  • And an additional file with naming conventions.


Each component type has documentation that explains how and when to use it, what are the dos and donâ€™ts you need to learn, and some examples. And the name? Okapis (or forest giraffes) are highly adaptable animals and this design system is just that: a great starting point that you can customize to your own needs.
